column5: Hope nobody cares about posting a location, these suckers are around for a few weeks . . . then noodnik. They are a lotta fun. There's still ice out on the lake . . . .   there is about 50' of open water, then ice. Good luck . . . .   have a ball, eh!
Great memories of fishing suckers at Beaverton with you and CPH and Big Cliff and Maureen in my healthier days...LOL
I remember the day that picture was taken Beansie. Fun times indeed.
